name: Monster Survival Game v1.1
description:
A boatload of new updates to a game I thought I'd never come to! Here are the patch notes!

-2 new monsters! Hybrids (Blue), & Mystics (Lavender & Black)
-Start menu
-Auto fire! no more sore fingers for you laptop players. Hold the left mouse to fire
-Player can now move with WASD, finally!
-Ammo, keep track of it
-New blood effects
-Balanced monster speeds and spawn rates (I'm aware how hard 1.0 is)
-Bullets 2 times faster!
-New music
-More fitting sound effects (All new sounds found on Freesounds.org)
-Texture updates
-Updated UI

& more I might have forgot to mention!
